summary: This document is a bank statement for Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of August 1, 2017, to August 31, 2017. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges, indicating the financial status of the business during that month.
keyFacts: The account belongs to Shocker Holdings LLC.
The beginning balance on August 1, 2017, was $18,354.45.
The ending balance on August 31, 2017, was also $18,354.45, indicating no transactions during the month.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived due to meeting balance criteria.
The document includes an introductory offer for business checks from Harland Clarke.
